info.title: Project Management API
info.description: API for managing projects and data sources

get.description: List all projects, optionally filtered by organization_id
Get a project by ID
List all available data source types

post.description: Connect a data source to a project

get.description: List all data sources connected to a project

post.description: Test the connection to a data source

delete.description:
Delete a data source and optionally its associated S3 object

Args:
    project_id: ID of the project the data source belongs to
    data_source_id: ID of the data source to delete
    delete_s3_object: Whether to delete the associated S3 object (default: True)
    force: Force deletion even if validation fails (default: False)

post.description: Upload an Excel file as a data source and store it in S3
Upload a CSV file as a data source and store it in S3
Upload any file type as a data source and store it in S3
Start a new training job for a project

get.description: List all training jobs for a project
Get the status of a training job

post.description: Create a new agent for a project

get.description:
List all agents for a project with optional filtering

Parameters:
- project_id: The ID of the project to list agents for
- owner: Optional owner to filter agents by
Get a agent by ID

put.description: Replace an entire agent with new data

schema.title: Response Delete Agent Projects  Project Id  Agents  Agent Id  Delete

post.description: Create a new task in a agent with project-level context

get.description:
Get tasks from an agent

Args:
    project_id: ID of the project
    agent_id: ID of the agent to get tasks from
    limit: Maximum number of tasks to return (1-100)
    sort_order: Sort direction ('asc' for oldest to newest, 'desc' for newest to oldest)
    status: Optional list of statuses to filter tasks by

parameters.name: skip

schema.description: Number of items to skip for pagination
schema.title: Skip

parameters.description: Number of items to skip for pagination

get.description: Get a specific task

put.description: Update a task status and/or content

schema.title: Response Delete Task Projects  Project Id  Agents  Agent Id  Tasks  Task Id  Delete

get.description: Stream updates for a specific task using Server-Sent Events

post.description: Submit feedback for a specific task

Create and start a new run following ACP protocol

This endpoint implements the ACP protocol POST /api/v1/runs endpoint
which creates a new run for the specified agent

get.description:
Get the current status and details of a run

This endpoint implements the ACP protocol GET /api/v1/runs/{run_id} endpoint
which returns the status and details of a run

post.description: Add a new tool to an agent

get.description: List all tools for a specific agent
Get a specific tool for an agent

patch.description: Update a specific tool for an agent

delete.description: Delete a specific tool for an agent

post.description: Create a new evaluation with CSV upload

get.description: List evaluations for an agent

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of evaluations to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of evaluations to return

get.description: Get evaluation by ID

schema.title: Response Delete Evaluation Projects  Project Id  Agents  Agent Id  Evaluations  Evaluation Id  Delete

get.description: Get test cases for an evaluation

post.description: Add a new test case to evaluation

schema.title: Response Delete Test Case Projects  Project Id  Agents  Agent Id  Evaluations  Evaluation Id  Test Cases  Test Case Id  Delete

get.description: List evaluation runs for an evaluation

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of runs to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of runs to return

get.description: Get evaluation run status and results

post.description: Create a new MCP gateway for a project

get.description:
List all MCP gateways for a project

Parameters:
- project_id: The ID of the project to list gateways for
Get a gateway by ID

schema.title: Response Delete Gateway Projects  Project Id  Mcp Gateway  Gateway Id  Delete

post.description: Add an agent as a tool to the gateway

get.description:
List all tools for a gateway

Parameters:
- project_id: The ID of the project
- gateway_id: The ID of the gateway to list tools for
Get a tool by ID

schema.title: Response Delete Tool Projects  Project Id  Mcp Gateway  Gateway Id  Tools  Tool Id  Delete
